plot outline: After an unsuccessful suicide attempt, Karthik is able to see the ghosts of four people - an old man, a crying woman, a little kid and a chain smoker. This meet changes his life as he tries to fulfill the last wishes of these ghosts which helps them to rest in peace. Karthik discovers a purpose in his life as he finds happiness in the small things.
title: Kaarmoda Saridu
